name: Eldertrail
description:
Eldertrail is a turn based Strategy Game inspired by legendary classics like Disciples 2 and Heroes of Might and Magic III. You will take control of unique heroes, explore the world, build up your town, fight tatcital battles, craft legendary weapons, level up your units and heroes to take out your opponents.

  • 3 unique factions
  • 9 heroes with extensive skills tree
  • More than 125 items & wapons
  • More than 80 crafting recipes
  • Card based exploration system
  • 4 unit types with individual  evolution trees
  • Dozen of passive and active abbilities 
  • Hot seat multiplayer up to 3 players
